original_title: Ruy, El caballero de la espada de madera
overview: Meet Ruy, the little Cid, a brave youngster who live in the Middle Ages. Watch his first feats and follow the early years of a well-known knight. Ruy, the little Cid, is a young boy who dreams a future as an invincible warrior. The making of the most famous medieval hero.
title: Ruy, the knight with a wooden sword
